title: Add an option to reduce screenshot size
content:
If I take a screenshot on my Pixel 3a, the resolution of the resulting image-file is 1080 x 2220.

For many purposes, I find this too-big and usually reduce the image resolution 50%, to 540 x 1110, which saves on the file-size.

It would be nice if a future version of Android had a native setting to save screenshots at 50% of the devices screen-resolution so I wouldn't need to resize them manually...
